summary: An article from "ScienceInsider" informed us about a possible solution to curing Ebola-infected patients. World Health Organization (WHO) proposed the idea of convalescent serum to cure Ebola! Basically, it is the idea of transferring blood of a cured patient to an Ebola-infected patient. This method was proven to work during the SARS outbreak in China. So far, there has been 1145 recorded deaths in a matter of weeks. There has been no official say in whether his method should be implemented due to risk of pathogens being contracted from the donator to the patient. It's also very difficult to get people to donate blood since "Blood is an entity that people pay a lot of attention to in West Africa.
title: Convalescent Serum?
